 # Example
    
Here is the three-card problem:

<pre class="webppl">
// three cards; with blue or red on either side
var cards = [["blue", "blue"],
             ["blue", "red"],
             ["red", "red"]]

var model = function() {
  var card  = uniformDraw(cards)
  var color = uniformDraw(card)
  condition(color == "blue")
  return card.join("-")
}

viz(Infer({method: "enumerate",
           model: model
           }))
</pre>

<script>
